concept.title: Settings Tab
concept.shortdesc: Adjust the appearance of the graph using the Settings Tab.

conbody.note: When working with large datasets, adjust the Shelf Radius, Fisheye Zoom and Fisheye Radius to separate the distance between nodes and "zoom in" on individual nodes.

row.entry: Adjust font size of Node labels in hover mode.
Adjust size of Selected Nodes; helps user see which Nodes will be effected by actions in the CommandsTab.
Adjust size of All Nodes for easier viewing.
Adjust font size of All Node labels.
Adjust font size of text body in Snippet Window.
Adjust font size of Triple (statement describing the subject, object and predicate); the Triple appears as a title above the text body in Snippet Window.
Adjust the attraction and repulsion between graphed nodes, similar to a magnetic charge.
Controls whether graphed nodes are fixed in the centre OR float free.
Adjust Shelf circumference; controls the size of the orbit containing ungraphed Nodes.
Control magnification scope of cursor; increased scope provides immersive 3D view of graph.
Adjust length of links between graphed Nodes.
Adjust thickness of links between graphed Nodes
Increases the variation in link thickness according to the number of shared connections, with thicker lines havin a higher Edge count.
Adjust the curvature of links to seperate or collapse multiple Edges.
Display the number of connections in the Edge label.
